entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mississauga
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:01 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 10:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -5.3°C
Wind: N 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain showers or flurries beginning in the morning and ending near noon then 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then west 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 3.
